data.text: Hanchu Phariseengei pâl kâra mi inkhat a riming Nicodemus Judangei ruoipu aoma.
Jân khat chu Jisua kôm a sea, a kôm, “Rabbi, Pathien juongtîr Minchupu ni ni ti kin riet. Pathien an chunga aom nônchu tutên nangma angin sininkhêlngei hih tho thei no ni ngei,” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Chongdiktak nang ki ril: tutu khom a suok nôk3:3 nôk; aninônchu chungtieng renga. nônchu Pathien Rêngram mu thei no ni ngei,” tiin a thuona.
Nicodemus'n a rekela, “Kho angin mo mi ulien a chang suo nûkin a suok nôk thei rang? A nû sûnga lûtin voinik suok thei no nih!” a tia.
Jisua'n, “Chongdiktak nang ki ril ani. Tukhom tui le Ratha'n a suok nôk nônchu Pathien Rêngram lût thei no nih.
Taksân ânzir kai chu taksa mi an nia, Ratha'n ânzir kai chu ratha mi an ni.
Nu suok nôk3:7: nôk; aninônchu chungtieng renga. rang kêng ki ti hih kamâm aom ti no roh.
Phâivuo hih anuomna ti-tieng asêma; arahang khom ni riet, aniatachu khotieng renga hong mo, khotieng mo ase rang riet mak che. Ma angdên hah ani, tukhom Ratha'n a suok nôk nônchu,” a tipea.
Nicodemus'n, “Kho angin mo anithei ranga?” tiin a thuona.
Jisua'n a kôm, “Israelngei lâia minchupu lien ni nia, hima roi hih ni riet minthâr theiloi mini?
Chongdiktak nang ki ril: kin ti hih kin riet ania, kin mu hih kin ril ani; hannoma, kin thurchi misîr tutên pom nuom mak chei.
Rammuola neinunngei chungroi ki misîr luo nin iem nônchu; i angin mo invân neinunngei chungroi ki misîr hin nin iem thei ranga?
Invân renga juong chumpu, Miriem Nâipasal tiloiin chu, tute invâna lei hong se sai la om mak ngei.”3:13: Chongtuon lâka mokhop ha archang 21 tena ânzompat thei.
Moses'n ramchâra sumdâr murûl a târ anghan Miriem Nâipasal khom târin a om ngêt rang ani,3:14: Tel 21:9
masika han tukhom ama iem kai chu kumtuong ringna an dôn theina rangin.
Pathien'n rammuol a lungkham tatak sikin a Nâipasal khât a pêka, masika han tukhom ama iem kai chu thi loia kumtuong ringna an dôn theina rangin.
Pathien'n rammuol theiloi mintum rangin a Nâipasal juongtîr maka, rammuol sanminring rangin kêng a juongtîr ani.
Tukhom Nâipasal a iem kai chu theiloi intumin om no ni ngeia, tukhom a iem loi ngei chu atûn renga theiloi changin an om zoi, Pathien Nâikhât an iem loi sikin.
Mahi theiloi intumna chu ani: vâr ha rammuola ajuonga, aniatachu, mingeiin avâr nêkin ajîng an midit uola, an sinthongei hah asaloi sikin.
Tukhom sin saloi tho ngei nâmin chu avâr an henga, avâra hong ngâi mak ngei; asaloi an thongei hah minlang an nuom loi sikin.
Aniatachu, adik sinpu ngeiin chu Pathien chongjômna sintho an ni ti avârin a minlang theina rangin avâra an hong ngâi.
Masuole chu, Jisua hah a ruoisingei leh Judea ramhuola an sea, mahan môrkhat an lâia omin baptis a thoa.
John khomin Aenon, Salim khuo kôla han mi a baptis ngâia, ma muna han tui atam sikin. Mingei a kôm an sea, male ama'n a lei baptis ngei ngâia.
(Ma zora han John ha intângna ina la khum mak ngei.)3:24: Mat 14:3; Mk 6:17; Luk 3:19,20
Hanchu John ruoisi senkhatngei le Juda3:25: Juda inkhat; miziek senkhat ngei an dôn chu Judangei senkhat. inkhat rusûk minsâina balam roia an inkhala.

Masikin John kôm an sea, “Minchupu, Jordan râl nisuo tienga no kôma om, a chungroi ni misîr ngâi hah na la riet mo? Asa, atûnhin, ama'n mi a baptis'a mi murdi ama tieng kêng an se suo zoi!” an tia.
John'n a thuona, “Miriemin ite dôn mak me, Pathien'n a pêk ani nônchu.
‘Keima hi Messiah ni mu-ung, aniatachu, a motona tîr ki ni’ ti hih nangni ngei reng hi ki rietpuipu nin ni.
Moi puma chu mâkpa hah ani; hannirese mâkpa mal, a kôla ândinga a he a rangâichaka, a rôl a rietin chu a râisân tatak ngâi. Ma angdên han ka râisâna mikhipin aom ani.
Ama chu a hôn lal tetet ngêt rang ania, keima chu ko hôn tem tetet rang ani.”
Chung tieng renga juongpu chu mi murdi nêka ânchungtak ani. Pila inzir chu pilchung mi ani, pilchung roi a misîr ngâi, hannirese, invân renga juongpu chu mi murdi nêka an chungtak ani.
A mu le a riet ngei a misîra, hannoma, tutên a thurchi misîr pom mak ngei.
Aniatachu, a thurchi misîr a pom kai chu Pathien chu mi diktak ani ti a nammindet ani.
Pathien tîrpu'n chu Pathien chong a misîr ngâi, Pathien'n ama Ratha akipin a pêk sikin.
3:35: Mat 11:27; Luk 10:22 Pa'n a Nâipasal a lungkham ngâia, neinunngei murdia a racham nuoia a dar let zoi.
Tukhom Nâipasal a iem kaiin chu kumtuong ringna an dôn zoi; tukhom Nâipasal chongjômloi chu ringna dôn no ni ngeia, Pathien dûkmintongna nuoia kêng an om rang.
